sect1.title: Where is the currency?
sect1.para: The position where the currency sign or name will be displayed depends on the locale. Still, when you want to define this setting yourself you have to use the display option and provide one of the following constants:

row.entry: Sets the standard position as defined within the locale
Displays the currency representation at the right side of the value
Displays the currency representation at the left side of the value
